extDescription.message: Provides additional features to Youtube. It can be used by checking the item you want to add.

Options_UseLocalTrueDescription.message: Use settings only on this device.

Options_UseLocalFalseDescription.message: Shared to devices that do not have "Use local storage" set to ON.

Options_ShowNotifyBadgeTrueDescription.message: Notify with badge if new features are implemented. Click here for update history.

Options_ShowNotifyBadgeFalseDescription.message: Not notify with badge even if new features are implemented. Click here for update history.

FullscreenChat_Description.message: View chat list in full screen

FullscreenChat_CardOpacityHover.message: Opacity for Super Chat on hover

FullscreenChat_UseChatDocking.message: Pin the chat list to the right side

FullscreenChat_ChatDockingDescription.message: To fix the chat list, grab and move it to the right edge of the screen.

ChatTickerScroll_Description.message: Mouse scrolling in Super Chat list
